name: Gamecage Mystery Mansion
description:
You Need to Download Kocho in order to Play, Available on Android and iOS

Mudkip is kidnapped and the GAMESCAGE crew have to go save him, together there gonna have to find their way through the mystery mansion and save mudkip Before it’s too late. 

Will fadel and his friends make it in time? It’s up to you

Play Gamescages Mystery Mansion Coming Sunday, Play the Demo Now!
